name: IODataQueueDispatchSource
desc: A dispatch source that manages a shared-memory data queue.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Creates a dispatch source that you use as a shared-memory data queue.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Handles the basic initialization of the dispatch source.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the data-queue dispatch source.

items.name: - SetDataServicedHandler
items.desc: Installs the handler block to execute when data is removed from the queue.

items.name: - DataServiced
items.desc: Responds to the removal of data from the queue.

items.name: - Enqueue
items.desc: Adds a single entry to the shared data queue.

items.name: - EnqueueWithCoalesce
items.desc: Adds an entry to the queue, but doesn't automatically send a data-available notification.

items.name: - SendDataAvailable
items.desc: Sends a notification to observers that indicates more data is available for processing.

items.name: - SetDataAvailableHandler
items.desc: Sets the handler block to run when another object adds data to the queue.

items.name: - DataAvailable
items.desc: Responds to the addition of new data to the queue.

items.name: - IsDataAvailable
items.desc: Checks whether the data queue contains data to process.

items.name: - Peek
items.desc: Returns the next queue entry without removing it from the queue.

items.name: - Dequeue
items.desc: Removes the next entry from the queue.

items.name: - DequeueWithCoalesce
items.desc: Removes the next queue entry, but doesn't automatically send notifications.

items.name: - SendDataServiced
items.desc: Notifies interested parties that you removed data from the queue.

items.name: - SetEnableWithCompletion
items.desc: Controls the enable state of the interrupt source.

items.name: - Cancel
items.desc: Cancels all callbacks from the dispatch source.

items.name: - CopyDataAvailableHandler
items.desc: A private method that the dispatch source uses to detect enqueued data.

items.name: - CopyDataServicedHandler
items.desc: A private method that the dispatch source uses to detect dequeued data.

items.name: - CopyMemory
items.desc: A private method that the dispatch source uses to copy memory.

items.name: - CheckForWork
items.desc: Checks for events to handle.
